mapper.select: SELECT A.PRPS_ID, A.PRPS_NM, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00022' AND E.CMM_CD = A.ACT_PLAN_CD) AS ACT_PLAN_CD_NM, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.PRPS_STR_DT, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y.%m.%d ') AS PRPS_STR_DT1, DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(A.PRPS_END_DT, '%Y%m%d'),'%Y.%m.%d ') AS PRPS_END_DT1, A.PRPS_STR_DT , A.PRPS_END_DT, A.ACT_PLAN_CD, (SELECT D.OUTLET_NM FROM T_VENDOR_M D WHERE D.VENDOR_NO = A.OUTLET_NO) AS VD_NM, A.OUTLET_NO, A.WHOLESALE_VENDOR_NO, A.MARKET_DIVS_CD, A.VENDOR_SGMT_DIVS_CD, A.BUDG_AMT,A.BASE_PRPS_AMT, A.LAST_PRPS_AMT, A.CASERATE_AMT, A.PRPS_CNTN, A.PRPS_STUS_CD, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00020' AND E.CMM_CD = A.PRPS_STUS_CD) AS PRPS_STUS_CD_NM, ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(E.CMM_CD_NM) FROM T_PROPOSAL_PURPOSE_M B,T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00021' AND B.PRPS_ID =A.PRPS_ID AND E.CMM_CD = B.PRPS_PURPOSE_CD GROUP BY PRPS_ID ) PRPS_PURPOSE_CD_NM, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(C.PRPS_PURPOSE_CD) FROM T_PROPOSAL_PURPOSE_M C WHERE C.PRPS_ID = A.PRPS_ID) PRPS_PURPOSE_CD FROM T_PROPOSAL_M A, T_EMP_M B WHERE A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND A.PRPS_ID = #{prps_id}

SELECT A.PRPSD_ID, A.PRPS_ID,A.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, '인센티브' AS PROD_SITEM_DIVS_NM, CONCAT(A.BRAND_NM,' ', A.SUB_BRAND_NM ,' ', A.PROD_ML_NM ) AS PROD_NO_SITEM_NM2, A.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, A.CASERATE_AMT CASERATE_AMT , A.DELIVERY_CNT DELIVERY_CNT, A.CASE9L , A.STD_CASE STD_CASE, A.UNIT_INCENTIVE_AMT UNIT_INCENTIVE_AMT, A.INCENTIVE_AMT INCENTIVE_AMT, A.VS_STD VS_STD, A.RMK_CNTN FROM( SELECT TPPD.PRPSD_ID, TPPD.PRPS_ID, TPPD.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, (SELECT TBM.BRAND_NM FROM T_BRAND_M TBM WHERE TBM.BRAND_ID = TPM.BRAND_ID) AS BRAND_NM, (SELECT SBM.SUB_BRAND_NM FROM T_SUB_BRAND_M SBM WHERE SBM.BRAND_ID = TPM.BRAND_ID AND SBM.SUB_BRAND_ID = TPM.SUB_BRAND_ID) AS SUB_BRAND_NM , (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = TPM.PROD_ML_CD) AS PROD_ML_NM, TPPD.CASERATE_AMT, TPPD.DELIVERY_CNT, TPPD.CASE9L, TPPD.STD_CASE, TPPD.UNIT_INCENTIVE_AMT, TPPD.INCENTIVE_AMT, TPPD.VS_STD, TPPD.RMK_CNTN FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD, T_PROD_M TPM WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID = ${prps_id} AND TPPD.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM = TPM.PROD_NO AND TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD='01' ORDER BY TPPD.PRPSD_ID ASC ) A

SELECT SUM(TPPD.CASERATE_AMT) CASERATE_AMT, SUM(TPPD.DELIVERY_CNT) DELIVERY_CNT, SUM(TPPD.CASE9L) CASE9L, SUM(TPPD.STD_CASE) STD_CASE, SUM(TPPD.UNIT_INCENTIVE_AMT) UNIT_INCENTIVE_AMT, SUM(TPPD.INCENTIVE_AMT) INCENTIVE_AMT, SUM(TPPD.VS_STD) VS_STD FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID =${prps_id} AND TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD='01'

SELECT TPPD.PRPSD_ID, TPPD.PRPS_ID, TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, 'A&P' AS PROD_SITEM_DIVS_NM, TPPD.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, TPPD.CASERATE_AMT , TPPD.DELIVERY_CNT , TPPD.CASE9L , TPPD.STD_CASE , TPPD.UNIT_INCENTIVE_AMT, TPPD.INCENTIVE_AMT, TPPD.VS_STD VS_STD, TPPD.RMK_CNTN FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID =${prps_id} AND PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD ='02' ORDER BY TPPD.PRPSD_ID ASC

SELECT SUM(TPPD.CASERATE_AMT) CASERATE_AMT, SUM(TPPD.DELIVERY_CNT) DELIVERY_CNT, SUM(TPPD.CASE9L) CASE9L, SUM(TPPD.STD_CASE) STD_CASE, SUM(TPPD.UNIT_INCENTIVE_AMT) UNIT_INCENTIVE_AMT, SUM(TPPD.INCENTIVE_AMT) INCENTIVE_AMT, SUM(TPPD.VS_STD) VS_STD FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID =${prps_id} AND TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD='02'

SELECT A.CASE9L, A.INCENTIVE_AMT, A.A_INCENTIVE_AMT, ((A.INCENTIVE_AMT + A.A_INCENTIVE_AMT) / A.CASE9L ) AS AVERAGE FROM ( SELECT SUM(TPPD.CASE9L) CASE9L, SUM(TPPD.INCENTIVE_AMT) INCENTIVE_AMT, (SELECT SUM(TPPD2.INCENTIVE_AMT) AS A_INCENTIVE_AMT FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD2 WHERE TPPD2.PRPS_ID = TPPD.PRPS_ID AND TPPD2.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD = '02') A_INCENTIVE_AMT FROM T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D TPPD WHERE TPPD.PRPS_ID =${prps_id} AND TPPD.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD='01' ) A
mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_PROPOSAL_M( PRPS_STR_DT, PRPS_END_DT, DEPT_NO, EMP_NO, WHOLESALE_VENDOR_NO, OUTLET_NO, MARKET_DIVS_CD, PRPS_NM, ACT_PLAN_CD, BASE_PRPS_AMT, LAST_PRPS_AMT, BUDG_AMT, CASERATE_AMT, PRPS_CNTN, PRPS_REG_DT, PRPS_STUS_CD, VENDOR_SGMT_DIVS_CD, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID ) VALUES ( #{prps_str_dt}, #{prps_end_dt}, #{dept_no}, #{emp_no}, #{wholesale_vendor_no}, #{outlet_no}, #{market_divs_cd}, #{prps_nm}, #{act_plan_cd}, 0, 0,0, 0, #{prps_cntn}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d'), #{prps_stus_cd}, #{vendor_sgmt_divs_cd}, now(), #{login_id}, now(), #{login_id} )
mapper.select: select D.PRPSD_ID, M.PRPS_ID, M.PRPS_STR_DT, M.PRPS_END_DT, D.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, D.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, D.CASE9L, D.DELIVERY_CNT, (SELECT B.BRAND_NM FROM T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M B, T_SUB_BRAND_M SB WHERE P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = SB.SUB_BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID = SB.BRAND_ID AND P.PROD_NO = D.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM LIMIT 1 ) BRAND_NM, (SELECT SB.SUB_BRAND_NM FROM T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M B, T_SUB_BRAND_M SB WHERE P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = SB.SUB_BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID = SB.BRAND_ID AND P.PROD_NO = D.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM LIMIT 1) SUB_BRAND_NM, (SELECT (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00017' AND E.CMM_CD = P.PROD_ML_CD) FROM T_PROD_M P, T_BRAND_M B, T_SUB_BRAND_M SB WHERE P.BRAND_ID = B.BRAND_ID AND P.SUB_BRAND_ID = SB.SUB_BRAND_ID AND B.BRAND_ID = SB.BRAND_ID AND P.PROD_NO = D.PROD_NO_SITEM_NM LIMIT 1) PROD_ML_NM, TIMESTAMPDIFF(month, DATE_FORMAT(M.PRPS_STR_DT, '%Y-%m-01') , DATE_FORMAT(M.PRPS_END_DT, '%Y-%m-01')) AS monthCnt FROM T_PROPOSAL_M M, T_PROPOSAL_PROD_D D WHERE M.PRPS_ID = ${prps_id} AND D.PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD ='01' AND M.PRPS_ID = D.PRPS_ID
mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_PROPOSAL_PROD_MON_D (PRPS_ID, PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, DELIVERY_MON, PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES (#{prpsId}, #{prodSitemDivsCd}, #{prodNoSitemNm}, #{deliDate}, #{planCnt}, now(), #{login_id}, now(), #{login_id})

INSERT INTO T_PROPOSAL_PROD_MON_D (PRPS_ID, PROD_SITEM_DIVS_CD, PROD_NO_SITEM_NM, DELIVERY_MON, PLAN_DELIVERY_CNT, REAL_DELIVERY_CNT, REAL_DELIVERY_CNTN , DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES (#{prpsId}, #{prodSitemDivsCd}, #{prodNoSitemNm}, #{deliDate}, #{planCnt}, #{real_delivery_cnt}, #{real_delivery_cntn}, now(), #{login_id}, now(), #{login_id})
